title: Deprecate PostgreSQL and MongoDB support for complex GraphQL analytics

description: Implement explicit guardrails so Postgres/SQLite/Mongo do not attempt investment distribution expansion via SQL.

title: feat: Work Item repo filtering by tags/settings - allow sync work-items to filter repos using repos.tags or repos.settings
description: Allow sync work-items to filter repos using repos.tags or repos.settings beyond just name glob. Useful for filtering by team ownership, service type, or custom attributes.

title: Rename atlassian client to atlassian_gen to avoid namespace collisions
description: Rename the internal Atlassian client package and imports to atlassian_gen to avoid conflicts with the public atlassian-python-api package, which is causing CI failures in Python 3.11.
close_reason: Renamed internal atlassian package to atlassian_gen and updated all imports and dependencies to avoid name collisions in CI.

title: task: Work tracking dashboards audit - validate filters and table joins for synthetic + real providers

close_reason: Dashboard audit complete: All filters use correct match() regex patterns with ifNull(nullIf(team_id, ''), 'unassigned') normalization. No problematic joins - dashboards use pre-aggregated tables. Empty results indicate missing data, not filter issues.

title: Note: gh pr create needs heredoc for multiline body

title: feat: Identity linking - map Work Items to Git commits via commit messages or smart matching
description: PRD requires reliable mapping of Work Items (Jira/Linear) to Git commits. Options: 1) Parse commit messages for issue keys (JIRA-123, #123) 2) Smart matching using title/description similarity 3) Branch name patterns. This enables tracing delivery from ticket to code.
close_reason: Implemented identity linking: commit message parsing, PR body parsing, branch name (head_ref) parsing. Creates direct issue→commit edges and enhanced issue→PR edges.
